question: what is the trends of the accidents over past 6 months?

semantic_info.table_comment: Monthly supplier KPIs captured per month with a unique constraint on (supplier_name, kpi_name, year, month).

columns.name: id
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the row.

columns.name: supplier_name
columns.description: Supplier identifier/name to which the KPI value applies. | Sample values: Acute_Wiring, Ankita_Auto, CAM, Daxter, JJ_Tecnoplast, Kamal, Laxmi_SPRINGS, Makarjyothi, S_B_Precision_Springs, Shree_Stamping, Unique_Systems, Victor_Engineers_ASAL

columns.name: kpi_name
columns.description: Name of the KPI metric| Sample values: accidents, machineBreakdowns, machineDowntimeHrs, okDeliveryPercent, partsPerTrip, productionLossHrs, quantityShipped, trips, vehicleTAT

columns.name: year
columns.description: Calendar year of the KPI measurement.

columns.name: month
columns.description: Calendar month of the KPI measurement (1-12).

columns.name: value
columns.description: Numeric KPI value for the supplier and month.

columns.name: unit
columns.description: Unit of measure for the KPI value| Sample values: Number of parts shipped by the supplier, Number of shipment trips completed per month, Production hours lost due to supplier-caused material shortage, Efficiency metric showing avg. parts shipped per trip, Number of safety incidents reported, Number of machine breakdowns, Machine breakdown time (in hours), Average vehicle turnaround time at the plant (in hours), Percentage of OK deliveries based on ACMA standards

columns.name: generated_on
columns.description: Date the KPI value was generated or sourced.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the record was inserted.
